item.description:
I know everyone has seen it. But it still ranks in my top 10 list of great movies. What would the the holidays be without the story of George Baily and Mr. Potter. Watch as good triumphs over evil ( I hope I didn't spoil the end!).

Directed by Frank Capra, with Jimmy Stewart, Donna Reed, and Lionel Barrymore.
item.how_to_find_us: As usual, I'll be in the lobby waiting. Glasses, short hair and the usual smile.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: It's A Wonderful Life
